name: Tank Gunner Shoot 3D
description:
Tank Gunner Shoot 3D is a panzer attack battle 3D game where you have to defend your pride and position against the enemy war tanks. The city is surrounded by the enemy tanks which are trying to destroy your beautiful city. They are coming from mountains side through the snowy mountains and you must have to stop them. Shoot enemy tanks simulators with your fast and fury war tank. Your fast and fury tank simulator is in a state of war. You are best tank rider in the world war army so it is time to show your army tank riding and fighting skills against enemy tanks
Features
• Outstanding 3D high definition quality graphics
• Amazing panzer battle field looking 3D environment
• Breathtaking realistic war zone missions
• Thrilling and dangerous missions that will shock you
• Very challenging missions
• Easy and intuitive control of modern panzer tank
